body:
Hey everyone, Porky here!
As some of you may know (those of you who are active on my channel), I am very close to 200 subscribers! (I am currently at 198).

Here is my channel : http://www.youtube.com/user/mlgporky

Please give me some ideas of special videos that I could do for the 200 subscriber special video!

My ideas so far:
  • YouTube challenge (chubby bunny, sprite and banana, dorrito ...etc)
  • Big Skype call and record a 30 min + video
  • Map Marathon (Record a bunch of adventure maps)
Please give me more ideas!
-Porky
